summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for a business checking account from September 1 to September 30, 2014. It includes information on deposits, checks paid, and service charges, as well as instructions for addressing errors in the statement.
locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, Virgin Islands, U.S.
keyFacts: The document details a business checking account with a beginning balance of $202,553.90 and an ending balance of $201,696.93 for September 2014.
A check numbered 1018 was paid on September 15, 2014, for the amount of $856.97.
There were no service charges or fees for the statement period.
The document provides instructions for reporting errors in the account statement within 60 days.
The account is held at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
